text: phu dı thi xallxhˌ thrng peid thrwngxk khxng khea pheux xislam læa khea xyu bn sængswang cak phracea khxng khea (ca hemuxnkab phu thi hawcı bxd kranan hrux?) Dangnan khwam wibati cng prasb dæ phu thi hawcı khxng phwk khea khæng kradang tx kar ra luk thung xallxhˌ chn hela ni xyu nı kar hlng phid xan chad cæng
